The paragraph does not mention any specific diseases. However, I am assuming that the context of this paragraph might be discussing the expansion of repeats in the untranslated regions (UTRs) of certain genes, which can lead to diseases. Based on this assumption, I am providing the two most common diseases associated with expansions in the UTRs: Myotonic dystrophy type 1 (DM1) and Fragile X-associated tremor/ataxia syndrome (FXTAS).
